budget_tips: Track every expense immediately using `/expense add`.
Set a daily spending limit and stick to it.
Use local transport instead of taxis to save money.
Cook one meal a day if you have a kitchen.
Look for free walking tours in the city.
travel_hacks: Roll your clothes to save space in your bag.
Scan your passport and email it to yourself.
Download offline maps before you leave Wi-Fi.
Bring a reusable water bottle to save money and plastic.
